name: Kraterios, Etherym of Emptiness
text:
2 Level 5 "Etherym" monsters
You can also Xyz summon this card using 1 "Etherym" Xyz Monster you control. You can target 1 of your "Etherym" monsters in your banishment; attach it to this card as Xyz Material. If your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 Xyz Material from this card; negate that effect and, if the monster is currently on the field, attach that card to this monster as Xyz Material. You can banish 1 monster from your GY (Quick Effect); Banish this card until the next End Phase. You can only activate each effect of "Kraterios, Etherym of Emptiness" once per turn.
